titles.title: A bill to extend temporary suspension of duty on 1,1,2-2-tetrafluoroethene, oxidized, polymerized.
A bill to extend temporary suspension of duty on 1,1,2-2-tetrafluoroethene, oxidized, polymerized.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 1,1,2-2-tetrafluoroethene, oxidized, polymerized.
